name: Chicken Broccoli Casserole
ingredients: 2 packages frozen broccoli spears, cut in half (or fresh equivalent)
3 cups Cream of Chicken Soup 1 tsp. lemon juice
steps: Bake chicken in garlic butter for 1 hour at 350° or until chicken is tender. Cut into large pieces. Line greased
pan with chicken and broccoli spears. Top with sauce.
Sprinkle top of casserole with parmesan cheese and paprika. Bake at 400 for 20-­‐30 minutes.
